name: Curupira (Raphael Carmo, William Florencio, MARCIO KRÜGER (CuriCom Games), Leandro Dotta)
name_original: Curupira (Raphael Carmo, William Florencio, MARCIO KRÜGER (CuriCom Games), Leandro Dotta)
description:
The player controls "Curupira", wich is a brazilian legend about a spirit protector of the forest. At each level, Curupira needs to help animals get out of the forest avoinding traps and hunters. The hunter and animals have their own movements at the map but the Curupira can influence that using whitles for calling of scaring them. By doing this, the player can manipulate their movements.

The theme Out of Control fits it because the objective of the game is to make the animals get to the end of the level. They have their own movement based on a AI and the player can only manipulate this movement using the whistle for calling of scare them.

- How to Play -

WASD - moves the character
Left Click - Whistle to call animals and hunters.
Right Click - Whistle to scare animals and hunters.

-Credits -
Leandro Dotta - Programmer
Lucy Gama - 2D Artist / Graphic Designer
Marcio Kruger - Sound Designer
Raphael Carmo - Game Designer
William Florencio - 2D artist / Animator

#GMTKJam
